Beautiful nature preserve. Not used much. Open marsh land, without much tree or scrub cover. Great place to see coastal bird life.
Every Tuesday, you can get half off breakfasts, including Captan Crunch french toast, which I find delicious, along with omelets, etc. Friendly service and very good prices.

The California Cottage.knownFor: “ One of those cute little shops on Main Street ” Reviewed June 4, 2016 This beachy-type shop is located along Main Street in Seal Beach, right across from the beach. It is a cute little shop filled with many interesting things related to the beach. A nice way to spend some time in Seal Beach. They even had cute beachy-type Christmas ornaments in May!
